page.title: 04NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content:
The Lea Show is held annually towards the end of August when the main attractions are the Flower Section with additional attractions of Gymkana, Goats, Dogs, Cage Birds, Long Dog Racing and numerous Stalls.
The Parents and Friends of Lea School have an Annual Donkey Derby which is hilarious and well attended.
The children of Lea School entertain the members of the Rainbow Club at Christmas with a Pantomime.
The Art Group hold an Annual Exhibition of their skilful work with the paint brush in Water Colour and Oils.
